entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 this evening then light late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
